position_number.title: Position number within dither pattern
position_number.description: MIRI imaging position number within dither pattern: 1-311 cycling, 1-12 Reuleaux, 1-5 Gaussian, 1 none. Note that the starting dither point number does not have to be 1 for cycling pattern.

x_offset.title: x offset from pattern starting position
x_offset.description: x offset from pattern starting position (arcsec): -13.695 to 14.225
x_offset.calculation: Lookup x offset in the PRD dither table for dither point.  Sum primary and subpixel dither offsets.
x_offset.source: Science and Operations Center Project Reference Database (PRD)

y_offset.title: y offset from pattern starting position
y_offset.description: y offset from pattern starting position (arcsec): -14.025 to 14.245
y_offset.calculation: Lookup y offset in the PRD dither table for dither point.  Sum primary and subpixel dither offsets.
y_offset.source: Science and Operations Center Project Reference Database (PRD)
